text: Kantojiu Temple () at Kantanagar is a late-medieval Hindu temple in Dinajpur District, Bangladesh. It was built by Maharaja Pran Nath; its construction started in 1702 and ended in 1752,Travel:Dinajpur , from Bangladesh Online (ISP). during the reign of his son Maharaja Ramnath. It has one of the best examples of terracotta architecture in Bangladesh. It once had nine spires, but they were all destroyed in an earthquake in 1897.Journey plus - Dinajpur . ==References== Category:Hindu temples in Bangladesh Category:1752 establishments Category:18th-century establishments in Bangladesh
title: Kantaji Temple
